languages.text: "Познай врага своего, чтобы одержать победу в битве. Познай соратника, чтобы одержать победу в войне".
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
languages.original_text: "Познай врага своего, чтобы одержать победу в битве. Познай соратника, чтобы одержать победу в войне".

traits.locale_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
"Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

languages.text: «Quien conoce a su enemigo triunfa en combate. Quien conoce a su aliado triunfa en la guerra».
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

traits.locale_text: «Quien conoce a su enemigo triunfa en combate. Quien conoce a su aliado triunfa en la guerra».

languages.text: 「敵を知り、戦いに勝つ。味方を知り、戦に勝つ」
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

traits.locale_text: 「敵を知り、戦いに勝つ。味方を知り、戦に勝つ」

languages.text: “了解你的敌人，便能赢得战斗的胜利。了解你的盟友，方可获得战争的胜利。”
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

traits.locale_text: “了解你的敌人，便能赢得战斗的胜利。了解你的盟友，方可获得战争的胜利。”

languages.text: "Kennt Euren Feind und besteht im Kampf. Kennt Euren Verbündeten und besteht im Krieg."
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

traits.locale_text: "Kennt Euren Feind und besteht im Kampf. Kennt Euren Verbündeten und besteht im Krieg."

languages.text: « Qui connaît son ennemi remporte la bataille, qui connaît son allié remporte la guerre. »
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

traits.locale_text: « Qui connaît son ennemi remporte la bataille, qui connaît son allié remporte la guerre. »

languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."

languages.text: "Düşmanını tanırsan muharebeyi kazanırsın. Dostunu tanırsan savaşı kazanırsın."
languages.original_text: "Know your enemy, and prevail in battle. Know your ally, and prevail in war."
